title: How Small Businesses Win on Reddit in 2025
description: Reddit's EVP of Business Marketing and Growth, Jim Squires, discusses strategies for small businesses and agencies to harness the platform's powerful community-driven marketing potential. From smart ad campaigns to interest-based targeting, this insider perspective offers marketers a game-changing approach to social media marketing that goes beyond traditional promotional tactics.
